title: 弱弱问下
author: asd8883260
txt_content: 蘑菇不用骨粉的情况下会长成大蘑菇么

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
看 WIKI 的說明... 
In Beta 1.8, you can make them grow by using Bone Meal on normal mushrooms only if the mushroom was planted on dirt. It is currently unknown if normal mushrooms can become huge mushrooms another way. 

也就是說, 到目前為止, 對種植於泥土上的蘑菇使用骨粉, 是唯一產生大蘑菇的方法...

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content:
1.8.1暂时不会
1.9好像会新增蘑菇环境

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-10-3 08:43 
不会！ 
就算1.9也不会
Mushroom Biomes.[15]
Naturally generated Huge Mushrooms.

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 那是自然生成的 不是你种下蘑菇他会变成大蘑菇 必须用骨粉
